Episodes.Title: Pawnee Zoo
Episodes.Plot: When Leslie decides to marry two penguins to promote the local zoo, she inadvertently causes an uproar when both penguins turn out to be male. Meanwhile, Mark puts Ann in an awkward situation when he asks her to go see a movie.

Episodes.Title: The Stakeout
Episodes.Plot: While pruning the new community garden, Leslie and Tom find that someone has been growing marijuana. To find those responsible, they decide to have an all-night stakeout of the garden. Meanwhile, Ann asks Leslie's permission to go on a date with Mark.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louis C.K., Jim O'Heir, Retta

Episodes.Title: Beauty Pageant
Episodes.Plot: Leslie gets to judge a beauty contest, but ends up having conflicting opinions on "the ideal woman" with the other judges. While on a date with Mark, Ann learns Andy has been living in the pit.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louis C.K.

Episodes.Title: The Practice Date
Episodes.Plot: Leslie is nervous about her first date with Dave, so Ann takes her on a practice date to help her prepare. Meanwhile, after a local councilman is caught up in a sex scandal, Tom, Ron, April and Mark decide to see who can uncover the worst dirt on each other.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louis C.K., Jim O'Heir, Retta, Kevin Symons

Episodes.Title: Sister City
Episodes.Plot: Leslie plays host to the Parks and Recreation department from Pawnee?s sister city, Boraqua, Venezuela, and is shocked at the cultural differences. Tom becomes an errand boy, and April plays hard to get.
Episodes.GuestStars: Fred Armisen, Federico Dordei

Episodes.Title: Kaboom
Episodes.Plot: Leslie, Ann and the rest of the Parks Department volunteer to help the organization KaBOOM! build a playground for a neighboring town. After building an entire playground in one day, Leslie gets frustrated at the lack of progress with the pit, and takes some advice from Mark to cut through the red tape.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul Scheer

Episodes.Title: Greg Pikitis
Episodes.Plot: Leslie enlists the help of Dave and Andy in order to catch a local teen vandal. Meanwhile, Ann struggles to make her Halloween party fun, and ends up getting help from an unlikely source.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louis C.K., Jim O'Heir, Cody Klop

Episodes.Title: Ron and Tammy
Episodes.Plot: Leslie is upset when she learns the library department wants to take over her lot. Making matters worse, the library is run by Ron's ex-wife Tammy, who still has a powerful emotional hold on him. Meanwhile, Andy gets a job in hopes of winning Ann back.
Episodes.GuestStars: Megan Mullally

Episodes.Title: The Camel
Episodes.Plot: After one of the murals in City Hall is defaced, Leslie and the Parks Department compete to come up with a new design. Meanwhile, Andy and Ron share an uncomfortable moment at the shoeshine stand.
Episodes.GuestStars: Phil Reeves, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Kirk Fox, Barry Sigismondi

Episodes.Title: Hunting Trip
Episodes.Plot: Leslie tries to prove she can hang with the guys so she invites herself on Ron?s annual hunting trip, but things don?t go as planned. Meanwhile, April and Andy bond in the office while everyone is away.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jim O'Heir, Retta, Jay Johnston

Episodes.Title: Tom's Divorce
Episodes.Plot: After Leslie finds out that Tom is getting a divorce, the department takes him out on the town to cheer him up. Meanwhile, Andy tries to hustle Mark in a game of pool.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jim O'Heir, Retta, Jama Williamson

Episodes.Title: Christmas Scandal
Episodes.Plot: Leslie designs the Pawnee Winter Wonderland Festival, but has to hide from the press when a meeting with a disgraced Councilman lands her in the middle of a sex scandal. Meanwhile, Ron offers to cover for Leslie for the day, and quickly discovers how much work she really does.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louis C.K., Pamela Reed, Kevin Symons, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Gillian Vigman, Phil Reeves, Mo Collins

Episodes.Title: The Set Up
Episodes.Plot: Ann sets Leslie up on a blind date with a co-worker, which does not go as well as Leslie hoped. An old friend of Ann's makes Mark feel insecure.
Episodes.GuestStars: Will Arnett, Justin Theroux, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Ben Schwartz

Episodes.Title: Leslie's House
Episodes.Plot: After an amazing date with Justin in Indianapolis, Leslie tries to impress him with a dinner party at her house.
Episodes.GuestStars: Justin Theroux, Bonita Friedericy, Jim O'Heir, Jama Williamson

Episodes.Title: Sweetums
Episodes.Plot: The Parks Department forms a partnership with a local company to sell energy bars at the parks in Pawnee, but Leslie tries to stop the deal when she discovers how unhealthy the snacks are. Mark reluctantly agrees to help Tom move out of his house.
Episodes.GuestStars: Justin Theroux, Phil Reeves, Don McManus, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Jama Williamson, Gary Weeks

Episodes.Title: Galentine's Day
Episodes.Plot: When Leslie hears her mom?s story about an old flame, she and her boyfriend Justin track him down and reunite them on Valentine?s Day. Meanwhile, Andy and his band are nervous about playing a gig at the Senior Center.
Episodes.GuestStars: Justin Theroux, Pamela Reed, John Larroquette, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Jama Williamson

Episodes.Title: Woman of the Year
Episodes.Plot: Leslie is outraged when Ron wins a ?Woman of the Year? award for a project she started. Meanwhile, Tom is desperate to find some money to invest in a local Pawnee club.
Episodes.GuestStars: Andy Milder, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Ben Schwartz, Ian Roberts, Maribeth Monroe

Episodes.Title: The Possum
Episodes.Plot: When a possum bites the mayor's dog on a golf course, Leslie is asked to form a task force to catch the pesky animal. Meanwhile, Ron is upset when Mark refuses to bend the rules for him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Judith Moreland, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Alison Becker

Episodes.Title: Park Safety
Episodes.Plot: After Jerry gets mugged by a bunch of kids, Leslie meets with the head park ranger in hopes of improving park safety. Meanwhile, everyone tries to be nicer to Jerry once he returns to the office.
Episodes.GuestStars: Andy Samberg, Phil Reeves, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Mo Collins

Episodes.Title: Summer Catalog
Episodes.Plot: Preparing the Summer Events Catalog, Leslie decides to take Ron and the past directors of the Parks Department out for a picnic lunch. Tom enlists the help of Ann and Mark to pose for the cover photo.
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Gross, Jack Wallace, Dakin Matthews, Jim O'Heir, Retta

Episodes.Title: 94 Meetings
Episodes.Plot: Ron is furious when April mistakenly schedules a ton of meetings for him. Meanwhile, Leslie fights to preserve a historical landmark.
Episodes.GuestStars: Susan Yeagley, Jim O'Heir, Christopher Murray, Alison Becker, John Ellison Conlee, Terri Hoyos

Episodes.Title: Telethon
Episodes.Plot: Leslie hosts a late-night shift for a local telethon, and lands former Indiana Pacer Detlef Schrempf as a celebrity guest. Meanwhile, Mark has big plans for his relationship with Ann.
Episodes.GuestStars: Andy Milder, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Mo Collins, Jim Meskimen, Detlef Schrempf, Kirk Fox

Episodes.Title: The Master Plan
Episodes.Plot: Leslie is disappointed when her new park plans are put on hold by a visit from two state auditors. April has plans for Andy at her birthday party, and Ann tries to piece together a romantic mystery.
Episodes.GuestStars: Adam Scott, Rob Lowe, Phil Reeves, Natalie Morales, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Ben Schwartz, April Marie Eden

Episodes.Title: Freddy Spaghetti
Episodes.Plot: When Ben prevents Leslie from holding a children?s concert, she takes matters into her own hands. Mark makes some big decisions about his life, and Andy gets some unexpected romantic attention.
Episodes.GuestStars: Adam Scott, Rob Lowe, Natalie Morales, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Jama Williamson
